Hello all,

I highly recommend considering the below opportunity,  and cons=
idering
joining Anh's lab in general.  He is fantastic, a deep learning tec=
hnical
wizard, very nice, very hard working, and would be a great advisor f=
or
anyone interested in the below subjects.

-Jeff Clune


On Wed, Apr 19, =
2017, 11:58 AM tot2ivn@... [neat] <
neat@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

>
>=

> Hello all,
>
>
> Following Amy, I'm also looking for Ph.D. students :), =
in this case, to
> study various exciting topics in Deep Learning, and espe=
cially its
> combination with evolutionary algorithms.
>
>
> Please feel fr=
ee to forward to people you think might be interested.
> Thanks!
>
>
> Anh
=
>
>
> ---
>
>
> * PH.D. POSITIONS IN DEEP LEARNING - USA *
>
>
> Deep Learn=
ing is a type of Artificial Intelligence that is transforming
> many indust=
ries nowadays including health care, transportation, and mobile
> computing=
.
>
> Multiple fully funded Ph.D. positions (supported via research
> assis=
tantships) are available now in this extremely fascinating area at Anh
> Ng=
uyen's lab at Auburn University, USA.
>
> More info: http://anhnguyen.me/re=
cruiting
>
>
> The particular research topic is flexible and will be in are=
as of mutual
> interest in Deep Learning. Topics include, but are not limit=
ed to: computer
> vision; generative modeling; understanding and explaining=
 deep neural
> networks; improving model reliability and security; or combi=
ning deep
> learning and evolutionary algorithms. The lab has previously wo=
n Best Paper
> Awards at CVPR, GECCO, ICML Visualization workshop and Best =
Research Video
> Awards at IJCAI and AAAI. Our work has also been repeatedl=
y featured in MIT
> Technology Review, Nature, Scientific American and deep=
 learning lectures
> across various institutions.
>
>
> Auburn is a small, =
friendly college town, a home for many types of outdoor
> activities, with =
a population around 60,000. It is near many major cities:
> 60 miles from M=
ontgomery, Alabama; 30 miles from Columbus, Georgia; and 100
> miles from A=
tlanta, Georgia. One also can hit the ocean in less than 4
> hours. Auburn =
has been previously ranked by CNNMoney, USNews and Forbes as
> one of the b=
est small cities to live in America. Opelika, Auburn=E2=80=99s sister
> cit=
y, is vibrant, full of quaint charm and rich in heritage.
>
>
> Preferred q=
ualifications: A strong mathematical background and good
> programming skil=
ls.
>
>
> If you are interested in applying, please send your inquiries or
=
> applications to anh.ng8@....
>
> Application instructions: http://a=
nhnguyen.me/recruting
>
>
> Deadlines: May 15 to start in Fall 2017 or Aug =
15 to start in Spring 2018.
> Positions are available until filled.
>
> 
>

      <p></p><p><span>Hello all,</span></p><p><span><br></span></p><p=
><span>Following Amy,=C2=A0</span><span style=3D"word-spacing:normal">I&#39=
;m also looking for Ph.D. students :), in this case, to study various excit=
ing topics in Deep Learning, and especially its combination with evolutiona=
ry algorithms.</span></p><p><span><br></span></p><p><span>Please feel free =
to forward to people you think might be interested. Thanks!</span></p><p><s=
pan><br></span></p><p><span>Anh</span></p><p><span><br></span></p><p><span>=
---</span></p><p><span><br></span></p><p>* PH.D. POSITIONS IN DEEP LEARNING=
 - USA *</p><p><br></p><p>Deep Learning is a type of Artificial Intelligenc=
e that is transforming many industries nowadays including health care, tran=
sportation, and mobile computing.</p><p>Multiple fully funded Ph.D. positio=
ns (supported via research assistantships) are available now in this extrem=
ely fascinating area at Anh Nguyen's lab at Auburn University, USA.</p>=
<p>More info: <a href=3D"http://anhnguyen.me/recruiting" target=3D"_blank" =
rel=3D"noreferrer">http://anhnguyen.me/recruiting</a></p><p><br></p><p>The =
particular research topic is flexible and will be in areas of mutual intere=
st in Deep Learning. Topics include, but are not limited to: computer visio=
n; generative modeling; understanding and explaining deep neural networks; =
improving model reliability and security; or combining deep learning and ev=
olutionary algorithms. The lab has previously won Best Paper Awards at CVPR=
, GECCO, ICML Visualization workshop and Best Research Video Awards at IJCA=
I and AAAI. Our work has also been repeatedly featured in MIT Technology Re=
view, Nature, Scientific American and deep learning lectures across various=
 institutions.</p><p><br></p><p>Auburn is a small, friendly college town, a=
 home for many types of outdoor activities, with a population around 60,000=
. It is near many major cities: 60 miles from Montgomery, Alabama; 30 miles=
 from Columbus, Georgia; and 100 miles from Atlanta, Georgia. One also can =
hit the ocean in less than 4 hours. Auburn has been previously ranked by CN=
NMoney, USNews and Forbes as one of the best small cities to live in Americ=
a. Opelika, Auburn=E2=80=99s sister city, is vibrant, full of quaint charm =
and rich in heritage.</p><p><br></p><p>Preferred qualifications: A strong m=
athematical background and good programming skills.</p><p><br></p><p>If you=
 are interested in applying, please send your inquiries or applications to =
<a href=3D"mailto:anh.ng8@..." target=3D"_blank" rel=3D"noreferrer">a=
nh.ng8@...</a>.</p><p>Application instructions: <a href=3D"http://anh=
nguyen.me/recruting" target=3D"_blank" rel=3D"noreferrer">http://anhnguyen.=
me/recruting</a></p><p><br></p><p>Deadlines: May 15 to start in Fall 2017 o=
r Aug 15 to start in Spring 2018. Positions are available until filled.</p>=
<p></p>

    </div>
